item.title: How to use cursor position in Strudel
item.description: Strudel is a live coding environment you can access from your browser. You can use standard Javascript in Strudel! which enables exciting things such as using the mouse position to control parameters. But you have to be careful, and use single quote strings (See here why). A first attempt only let us use the value of the cursor at the time of (re)evaluation. Thus, we cannot change the parameters just by moving the cursor as in Hydra.
